title: Milan-San Remo: Van der Poel Withstands Pogačar’s Attacking Storm, Outkicks World Champ and Ganna in Sprint
content:
Pogačar ignites Milan-San Remo on the Cipressa but can't drop Van der Poel and Ganna ahead of three-up showdown on the Via Roma.

Read the full article at Milan-San Remo: Van der Poel Withstands Pogačar’s Attacking Storm, Outkicks World Champ and Ganna in Sprint on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
